title: Ticket #5722: Cache job status queries in the blahp
description:
The blahp's querying of job status from the batch system is very inefficient and puts a lot of stress on the system. A simple improvement is to have the status script query the status of all jobs and save the results in a cache file. In subsequent invocations, the status script would use the cache file if it's recent enough.

OSG has done this for PBS, and we can take their script. It would be pretty easy to alter this script to produce a version for SLURM.
